title: Labels Over Bars   A Different Method
author: The Flerlage Twins
description: Check out a new method for placing labels over the bars in Tableau while being able to control how close the labels are to the bars.

title: The Easiest Instructional Overlay Ever (Credit Zach Bowders)
author: The Flerlage Twins
description: This is the EASIEST way to create a "how to read" overlay in Tableau. It takes two minutes and you don't have to even leave Tableau.

title: Completely Change the way you use Tableau's Layout Containers
author: The Flerlage Twins
description:
This video will show you how to not get tripped up using layout container and give you the CRITICAL FIRST STEP in ensuring this doesn't happen. This all originated with Curtis Harris' video "Things I know about layout containers" (link below). It shows his method then walks through how I've learned to use it over the past 6 or 7 years. 

Link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L1gC05jyMS8

title: Build a Feedback Tool Into Your Tableau Workbook!!
author: The Flerlage Twins
description: This tutorial from regular contributor, Kasia Gąsiewska-Holc, shows a really creative way to collect interactive feedback from directly within your Tableau dashboard.

title: My Makeover Monday
author: The Flerlage Twins
description: I started the year by getting involved with MakeoverMonday and in this video, I'll walk through four examples. The intention is to help us recognize problems in the data, walk through my thought process, explore data in Tableau to find insights, discuss design choices, and build some charts in Tableau.

title: Favorites of 2021
author: The Flerlage Twins
description: Our favorite Tableau Public vizzes of 2021

title: Custom Date Drill Down Trend Charts
author: The Flerlage Twins
description: This tutorial from regular contributor, Kasia Gąsiewska-Holc, shows a really creative way to create "Custom Date Drill Down Trend Charts".

title: Blank Unicode Character
author: The Flerlage Twins
description: Did you know there was such thing as a Blank Character?  And that there are some super cool things you can do with it in Tableau? Check out this video to see five of them.

title: 5 Things You Can Do in Web Edit, But NOT Tableau Desktop
author: The Flerlage Twins
description: Did you know there are some super cool things you can do in Tableau's Web Edit that you CANNOT do in Tableau Desktop?  Check out this video to see five of them.

title: Single Sheet Trellis Chart Zoom
author: The Flerlage Twins
description: In Tableau, allow your users to zoom into any single chart within a trellis chart (small multiples) and create this all on a single sheet.

title: Tableau数据故事慧28 A Little Obscure, A Little Random, and A Lot Useful 字幕有换行版 有删减 (Chinese Subtitles)
author: The Flerlage Twins
description: In this presentation, the Flerlage Twins demonstrate several techniques for the Hong Kong Tableau User Group.  This presentation includes both English and Chinese subtitles.

title: Ken & Kevin's Top Ten Favorite Tableau Public Visualizations of All Time
author: The Flerlage Twins
description: In this video, Ken and Kevin reveal and discuss their favorite Tableau Public vizzes of all time.

title: One Calc Basic Beeswarm
author: The Flerlage Twins
description: In Tableau, create a "Basic Beeswarm" (more aptly named a centered unit histogram) with just a few steps and ONE calculation.  Check out the actual Tableau Public workbook here: https://public.tableau.com/profile/kevin.flerlage#!/vizhome/OneCalcBasicBeeswarm/OneCalcBasicBeeswarm

title: Tiled Container Selector
author: The Flerlage Twins
description:
Tableau 2021.2 allows you to open/close tiled containers!  For more information, check out the blog post and example viz:
Blog: https://www.flerlagetwins.com/2021/08/create-tiled-container-selector.html
Viz: https://public.tableau.com/app/profile/kevin.flerlage/viz/TiledContainerSelector/TiledContainerSelector

title: Obscure PowerPoint Tips and Tricks for Dashboards
author: The Flerlage Twins
description: We've done several blog posts on how to use PowerPoint with your dashboards, but this one shows you some more obscure PowerPoint tips and tricks.  Check out https://www.flerlagetwins.com/ for more Tableau, data, and PowerPoint blog posts.
